content.rendered:
Dear SSHS Community, 

The October 2022 Newsletter is now available for viewing!  Please click the link to access:  https://www.smore.com/mnkhs

This month’s highlights includes information for: Open House, Homecoming Week , Yearbook orders, and celebrations from the previous month.

Have a wonderful October!

Sincerely, 

SSHS Leadership Team
